description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Ever since the ancient Greeks developed the first version of natural philosophy, it has been hypothesized that tapping the A button on one's Xbox 360 controller 1,000,000 times would make that person very cool.   Featuring captivating 4-player cooperative play and a never-before-seen "Fast Tap Challenge," One Million Taps may be the best game known to man.   Can you do one million taps?
